verbs.description: [ARG1: U.S. stocks] [V: were] [ARGM-ADV: generally] [ARG2: lower] [ARGM-TMP: Friday] [ARGM-TMP: as geopolitical fears following President Donald Trump 's move to cancel a key summit with North Korea weighed on solid corporate earnings] .

U.S. stocks were generally lower Friday as [ARG1: geopolitical fears] [V: following] [ARG2: President Donald Trump 's move to cancel a key summit with North Korea] weighed on solid corporate earnings .
